job_description:
Position : Sr Java Developers

Location : Canada (Mississauga, ON)

Exp:-6-9 yrs

No of Positions : Multiple

What are we looking for - the must have Tech Skills
6+ years in design and development of applications using Java, J2EE
5+ years of experience in web technology stack including but not limited to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, JSON
5+ years of working with one or more backend databases RDBMS and NoSQL: Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc.
5+ years of development using Spring, Hibernate
Experience in development of REST APIs, Microservices
Experience in webservers like Apache Tomcat, Weblogic, IBM Websphere
Experience with source control tools (Git, SVN etc.)
Build and release management experience with tools like Maven, ANT, Gradle (or similar tools)
Experience in containerization, Docker, Kubernetes is an asset
Who makes the top of the list - it's just not the tech...
You have a passion to design and develop complex applications - experience in application development in a banking and financial services setting is ideal
Strong debugging, problem solving and investigative skills
Expert in log analysis and pursue leads to find root cause problems
Experience in working in a with Agile/Scrum delivery methodology
Bachelor's Degree in MIS, Computer Science (Master's Degree in similar field of study is an asset)
Excellent communication skills with previous consulting experience is idea
